item.description:
RSVP: http://bit.ly/IGw44A
----
Most investors want to establish a real estate portfolio that will, eventually, replace their income. Most investors want it but not sure how to accomplish it!
This class will tech you how to accomplish it.
Two parts educational class that will teach you:
The amazing main benefits Real estate investing offers
How to create a cashflow-generating portfolio
Ways to ACCELERATE your portfolio formation
Method to TURBO-CHARGE your portfolio
About the Teacher
Dani Beit-Or will teach YOU how to accelerate and turbo-charge your real estate portfolio. By incorporating simple investment techniques and strategies together, busy investors can setup their long and short term financial goals.
Dani is an experienced real estate investor and mentor who operates Simply Do It - a Bay Area based real estate investment boutique, www.simplydoit.net as well as the Silicon Valley Real Estate investment Club - http://svreiclub.com/
----
RSVP: http://bit.ly/IGw44A
item.name: Learn The Playbook for Accelerating Your Cashflow Portfolio Formation
